column4: Gutsy Gibbon Tribe 2 live CD: on boot, it loads to a brown/orange Ubuntu background, nothing more. I am able to do a Ctl+Alt+F1 to get to a terminal
how can I install it, or how can I boot it into an install mode like Ubuntu used to have?
do you really need to install such an alpha release??
as i pointed out earlier for gutsy help head to #ubuntu+1 please; TIA
